txt_en: Focus on the present, not the past or future.
txt_cn: 不念过往，不畏将来，专注当下。

txt_en: Move forward to keep life balanced.
txt_cn: 人生如骑行，前进即平衡。

txt_en: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
txt_cn: 唯一真正的智慧，是知道自己一无所知。

txt_en: Silence is the most perfect expression of scorn.
txt_cn: 沉默是轻蔑最完美的表达。

txt_en: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
txt_cn: 生命如花，爱情是蜜。

txt_en: Every man is a poet when he is in love.
txt_cn: 每个恋爱中的人都是诗人。

txt_en: Don’t burn bridges. A wide network provides support.
txt_cn: 别自断后路，广阔人脉网提供前进资源。

txt_en: All advantages aren't in running quickly, but in getting a head start.​
txt_cn: 优势不在于跑得快，而在于起身早。

txt_en: Don't focus on why it can't work. Trust the reason why it can.​
txt_cn: 忘掉所有"不可能"的借口，坚持那一个"可能"的理由。

txt_en: Face the sunshine, leave shadows behind.
txt_cn: 面向阳光，阴影自褪。

txt_en: You're someone's whole world.
txt_cn: 一人即某人的全世界。

txt_en: Talent without working hard is nothing.
txt_cn: 没有努力，天份不代表什么。

txt_en: May the Force be with you.
txt_cn: 愿原力与你同在。——《星球大战》

txt_en: Loving helps grow; liking just takes.
txt_cn: 爱助生长，喜欢只懂索取。

txt_en: Time heals hearts and wounds.
txt_cn: 时间愈心伤，亦平身创。

txt_en: Success is built on failed years.
txt_cn: 成功皆筑于经年败绩。

txt_en: Judge not from appearances.
txt_cn: 人不可貌相，海不可斗量。

txt_en: Custom makes all things easy.
txt_cn: 习惯成自然。

txt_en: Time and tide wait for no man.
txt_cn: 时光如逝水，岁月不待人。

txt_en: Mama says, 'Stupid is as stupid does.'-Forrest Gump, 1994
txt_cn: 妈妈说，‘做傻事的才是傻瓜。'——《阿甘正传，1994》

txt_en: Strength knows conflict; weakness is born vanquished.
txt_cn: 强者才懂斗争，弱者生来被征服。

txt_en: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.
txt_cn: 成功的秘诀在于忠于目标。

txt_en: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
txt_cn: 通往值得去的地方，从无捷径。

txt_en: Perfection is not attainable, but chasing it leads to excellence.
txt_cn: 完美虽不可达，追求它却能成就卓越。

txt_en: Pains make stronger, tears make braver,and heartbreaks make wiser.
txt_cn: 伤痛铸坚强，眼泪淬勇敢，心碎炼智慧。

txt_en: I'm the king of the world!
txt_cn: 我是世界之王！

txt_en: I feel the need — the need for speed!
txt_cn: 我感觉到一种需要——速度的需要!

txt_en: Do the new to gain the new.
txt_cn: 行未为之事，得未有之物。

txt_en: Through the darkness, we can see the light.
txt_cn: 捱过黑暗，才能看见光明。

txt_en: Strive for tomorrow, not regret yesterday.
txt_cn: 奋斗未来，莫悔往昔。

txt_en: You are unique; nothing can replace you.
txt_cn: 你举世无双，无人可以替代。
